data.text: @lneumannca @flindall_steve You mean the same way that for the last 2 years people have pushed others to put them on  ? Turnabout is  fair play  !
@EveExamines @robellidoherr Thin line between caution and paranoia.  You folks have crossed it  !
@flindall_steve That’s pretty presumptuous of you to narrow it down to that!! Omg

@leialululu @EcoFashionByBG @JBG_1979 @flindall_steve I don’t think you do. What else happened to her? What was she doing for the 30 days leading up to it? I broke my nose the same year I got laid for the first time. Causation vs correlation.

@flindall_steve If you keep testing and testing you’re  bound to test positive at some point. As long as everyone is ok , who cares ? Probably wouldn’t even know if you didn’t keep testing , if its actually positive. Fun fact , my 5 years old has never worn a mask once. We’re all all alive
@flindall_steve Reread what you wrote.  Keep rereading it until you see it
@flindall_steve Read the disclaimer on the box of masks. Masks stop nothing. You are a tool of government propaganda. Sad. https://t.co/POwV4UoYaU

@flindall_steve We are the same. Two years of vigilance and now all of us have COVID- including my 86 year-old mother who we moved in with us last year. Removing the mask mandate for schools is insanity.
